trans-unit.source: Defines the optional base class for XML Web services, which provides direct access to common ASP.NET objects, such as application and session state.
trans-unit.target: Define a classe base opcional para XML Web services, que fornece acesso direto a objetos comuns do ASP.NET, como o estado de sessão e de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: If you don't need access to the common ASP.NET objects, you can still create an XML Web service without deriving from WebService.
trans-unit.target: Se você não precisar de acesso a objetos comuns do ASP.NET, você ainda pode criar um serviço Web XML sem derivando de serviço Web.

trans-unit.source: Additional ASP.NET objects can be accessed through <xref:System.Web.Services.WebService.Context%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Objetos ASP.NET adicionais podem ser acessados por meio de <xref:System.Web.Services.WebService.Context%2A>.</xref:System.Web.Services.WebService.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: XML Web service methods that have the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> property of either <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> set to `true`, do not have access to their <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.
trans-unit.target: Métodos de serviço da Web em XML que têm o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A>propriedade do <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>definida como `true`, não têm acesso a seus <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A>

trans-unit.source: As such, accessing any of the properties of the WebService class, from within that XML Web service method, return `null`.
trans-unit.target: Assim, acessar qualquer uma das propriedades da classe de serviço Web, de dentro desse método de serviço da Web em XML, retornar `null`.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the .NET Framework version 1.0 XML Web service methods that have either the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> attribute applied to them with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> property of set to `true`, do not have access to their <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> using the static <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se você estiver usando métodos do .NET Framework versão 1.0 XML Web Services que tenham o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>atributo aplicado a eles com o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A>propriedade de conjunto para `true`, não têm acesso a seus <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>usando estático <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To access the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, derive the class implementing the XML Web service method from WebService and access the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebService.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, derive a classe que implementa o método de serviço da Web em XML de serviço Web e acesso a <xref:System.Web.Services.WebService.Context%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Services.WebService.Context%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.WebService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.WebService"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets the application object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o objeto de aplicativo para a solicitação HTTP atual.

trans-unit.source: XML Web services can use both application state and session state.
trans-unit.target: Os XML Web services podem usar o estado do aplicativo e o estado da sessão.

trans-unit.source: Application state is maintained across all sessions accessing an XML Web service regardless of whether session state is turned off for a method(by using the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.EnableSession%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>).
trans-unit.target: Estado do aplicativo é mantido em todas as sessões acessando um serviço da Web em XML, independentemente de quando o estado da sessão é desativado para um método (usando o <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.EnableSession%2A>propriedade o <xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute>).</xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.WebMethodAttribute.EnableSession%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.HttpApplicationState"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ASP.NET <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request, which encapsulates all HTTP-specific context used by the HTTP server to process Web requests.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o ASP.NET <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> para a solicitação atual, que encapsula todo o contexto HTTP específica usada pelo servidor de HTTP para processar solicitações da Web.

trans-unit.source: XML Web service methods that have either the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute> or <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> attribute applied to them with the <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> property of set to `true`, do not have access to their <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> using the static <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Métodos de serviço da Web em XML que tenham o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>ou <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute>atributo aplicado a eles com o <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A>propriedade de conjunto para `true`, não têm acesso a seus <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>usando estático <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Current%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute.OneWay%2A> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapDocumentMethodAttribute> </xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapRpcMethodAttribute>

trans-unit.source: To access the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, derive the class implementing the XML Web service method from <xref:System.Web.Services.WebService> and access the Context property.
trans-unit.target: Para acessar o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>, derive a classe que implementa o método de serviço da Web em XML de <xref:System.Web.Services.WebService>e acessar a propriedade de contexto.</xref:System.Web.Services.WebService> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref> for the current request.
trans-unit.target: O ASP.NET <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref> para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: Context is .
trans-unit.target: Contextis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.HttpServerUtility"></xref> for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.HttpServerUtility"> </xref> para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility> class provides several methods that can be used in the processing of Web requests, including <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.CreateObject%2A> (for instantiating COM objects).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>classe fornece vários métodos que podem ser usados no processamento de solicitações da Web, incluindo <xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.CreateObject%2A>(para instanciar objetos COM).</xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility.CreateObject%2A> </xref:System.Web.HttpServerUtility>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.HttpServerUtility"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.HttpServerUtility"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"></xref> instance for the current request.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"> </xref> instância para a solicitação atual.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"></xref> representing the ASP.NET session state object for the current session.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState"> </xref> que representa o objeto de estado de sessão ASP.NET para a sessão atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the version of the SOAP protocol used to make the SOAP request to the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a versão do protocolo SOAP usada para fazer a solicitação SOAP para o serviço Web XML.

trans-unit.source: If the SOAP protocol was not used to communicate with the XML Web service, such as HTTP-GET or HTTP-POST, the value of the SoapVersion property is <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion>.
trans-unit.target: Se o protocolo SOAP não foi usado para se comunicar com o serviço da Web em XML, como HTTP GET ou POST HTTP, o valor da propriedade SoapVersion é <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion>

trans-unit.source: For XML Web services that do not derive from the <xref:System.Web.Services.WebService> class, the version of the SOAP protocol used to make the SOAP request to the XML Web service can be also be accessed using the "WebServiceSoapVersion" entry of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para XML Web services que não derivam de <xref:System.Web.Services.WebService>classe, a versão do protocolo SOAP usada para fazer a solicitação SOAP para o serviço ser também podem ser acessados usando a entrada "WebServiceSoapVersion" do XML Web o <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Items%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.Services.WebService>

trans-unit.source: That entry is of type <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion>.
trans-unit.target: Essa entrada é do tipo <xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion>.</xref:System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapProtocolVersion"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ASP.NET server <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User*> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o servidor ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User*>objeto.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User*>

trans-unit.source: Can be used to authenticate whether a user is authorized to execute the request.
trans-unit.target: Pode ser usado para autenticar se um usuário está autorizado a executar a solicitação.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal> representing the ASP.NET server <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User*> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>que representa o servidor do ASP.NET <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User*>objeto.</xref:System.Web.HttpContext.User*> </xref:System.Security.Principal.IPrincipal>
